metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0334 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Moodle in versions 3.11 to 3.11.4, 3.10 to 3.10.8, 3.9 to 3.9.11 and earlier unsupported versions. Insufficient capability checks could lead to users accessing their grade report for courses where they did not have the required gradereport/user:view capability.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
